page.title: 16Legends of Linwood
page.content: The Speir family were once a very wealthy family in{Linwood.}They lived in{Burnbrae House }and owned much farm land around{Linwood.}5 members of the Speir family are buried in the family vault under the Old Parish Church Hall.It is said that if the vault is disturbed,then Mary Ann Speirs will haunt the villagers of{Linwood.} Permission has been given to knock down the Old Parish Church Hall and build a new Manse but,there are no plans to do this so far.Another legend of{Linwood}tells of a poltergeist which is said to be in the White House in{Linwood.}One woman who went to buy this house was told by servants of queer happenings during the night.These stories scared the woman and she decided not to buy the house.It is now owned by Civil Defence.
